Texto: 
mild joint line tenderness, no instability
none
lucency along the articular surface of the patella, superolateral location.  no effusion

hypointense on all sequences with a sclerotic rim, no cartilage defect, no effusion
dorsal defect of the patella
chondromalacia patella.
patellar fracture
25 year old male with knee pain, found to have a lucent area along the patella on plain films, referred for mri of the knee
